page.title: 03Education in Honiton
page.content: The state primary schools, Honiton, Littletown and Offwell take pupils aged 5 to 11. Honiton School's nursery class meets for half days and there are 3 playgroups for pre-school children. Manor House is a private, fee-paying school. Millwater School's pupils have moderate or severe learning difficulties and a few are also physically handicapped. The Honiton Community College has pupils between 11 and 16 years. Some leave for Further Education at the East Devon and Exeter Colleges or go into Youth Training Schemes. About a third stay in the Community College Sixth Form before entering employment or University. The Community College provides a programme of adult classes, arts events and the 251 Club for young people.
